title: Roll up your sleeves: Kids' turn arrives for COVID-19 shots
author: LINDSEY TANNER; AP Medical Writer
description: The U. S. enters a new phase Wednesday in its COVID-19 vaccination campaign, with shots now available to millions of elementary-age children in what health officials hailed as a major breakthrough after more than 18 months of illness, hospitalizations, deaths and disrupted education.
